1.panel_description: Display the most beautiful places in the world.

1.handles: Retrieves a list of beautiful places in the world

input_vars.name: query_beautiful_places
input_vars.description: Query to get the most beautiful places in the world
input_vars.value: What are the most beautiful places in the world?

output_vars.name: beautiful_places_list
output_vars.description: List of beautiful places in the world
output_vars.value:
"The world is replete with breathtakingly beautiful places, each offering unique natural wonders, cultural significance, and awe-inspiring landscapes. Here are some of the most stunning destinations highlighted across various sources:

    Montenegro: Kotor Bay, Lake Skadar, Tara River
    Greece: Lefkada Island
    Oman: Shariqiya Sands
    Mexico: Las Coloradas Lagoon
    Brazil: Rio Sucuri, Paraty
    Australia: Tarkine Rainforest, Tasmania
    United States: Joshua Tree National Park, Bisti/De-Na-Zin Wilderness
    Vietnam: Fansipan, Mù Cang Chải, Tu Le Valley
    Japan: Mount Yoshino, Arashiyama Bamboo Grove
    Iceland: The Faroe Islands
    Jordan: Petra
    Italy: Lake Como, Saturnia
    Greenland: Ilulissat Icefjord
    Indonesia: Raja Ampat"

2.panel_description: Display the country heads of the beautiful places.

1.handles: Finds the country heads of the beautiful places

input_vars.name: beautiful_places_list
input_vars.description: List of beautiful places from Panel 1
input_vars.value: ["Kotor Bay", "Lake Skadar", "Tara River", "Lefkada Island", "Shariqiya Sands", "Las Coloradas Lagoon", "Rio Sucuri", "Paraty", "Tarkine Rainforest", "Joshua Tree National Park", "Bisti/De-Na-Zin Wilderness", "Fansipan", "Mù Cang Chải", "Tu Le Valley", "Mount Yoshino", "Arashiyama Bamboo Grove", "The Faroe Islands", "Petra", "Lake Como", "Saturnia", "Ilulissat Icefjord", "Raja Ampat"]

output_vars.name: country_heads_list
output_vars.description: List of country heads for the beautiful places
output_vars.value:
```json
    {
      "Kotor Bay": "President Jakov Milatović - Montenegro",
      "Lake Skadar": "President Jakov Milatović - Montenegro, President Bajram Begaj - Albania",
      "Tara River": "President Jakov Milatović - Montenegro, Presidency Željko Komšić, Milorad Dodik, Željka Cvijanović - Bosnia and Herzegovina",
      "Lefkada Island": "President Katerina Sakellaropoulou - Greece",
      "Shariqiya Sands": "King Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud - Saudi Arabia",
      "Las Coloradas Lagoon": "President Andrés Manuel López Obrador - Mexico",
      "Rio Sucuri": "President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva - Brazil",
      "Paraty": "President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva - Brazil",
      "Tarkine Rainforest": "Prime Minister Anthony Albanese - Australia",
      "Joshua Tree National Park": "President Joe Biden - United States",
      "Bisti/De-Na-Zin Wilderness": "President Joe Biden - United States",
      "Fansipan": "President Võ Văn Thưởng - Vietnam",
      "Mù Cang Chải": "President Võ Văn Thưởng - Vietnam",
      "Tu Le Valley": "President Võ Văn Thưởng - Vietnam",
      "Mount Yoshino": "Prime Minister Fumio Kishida - Japan",
      "Arashiyama Bamboo Grove": "Prime Minister Fumio Kishida - Japan",
      "The Faroe Islands": "King Frederik X - Denmark, Prime Minister Aksel V. Johannesen - Faroe Islands",
      "Petra": "King Abdullah II - Jordan, Prime Minister Bisher Al-Khasawneh - Jordan",
      "Lake Como": "President Sergio Mattarella - Italy, Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni - Italy",
      "Saturnia": "President Sergio Mattarella - Italy, Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni - Italy",
      "Ilulissat Icefjord": "King Frederik X - Denmark, Prime Minister Múte Bourup Egede - Greenland",
      "Raja Ampat": "President Joko Widodo - Indonesia"
    }
    ```
